LanguageData.sd_goodnight_research_industrial_beds.de: New means to sleep, more time for your colonists to run wild.
LanguageData.sd_goodnight_research_medieval_beds.desc: Not live like a king,but sleep like one.
LanguageData.sd_goodnight_research_spacer_beds.label: space beds
LanguageData.sd_goodnight_research_spacer_beds.descri: Under the offical term of "futuristic bed research" your scientists will discover what sleep really means.
